segments.text: Hey , May , look , Is that the the poster of the movie we saw yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's right . That's the poster of the The Witch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May , I really regret watching it with you last night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . I just thought the movie was ... boring .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Boring ? Come on , you clutched to my arm all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I admit . The ghosts were scary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's Gucci's influence . I love science fiction movies !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course you do . They are silly stories just for little kids like you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't call me kid . I am a grownup .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you dare watch scary movies with me tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course ! I can watch them without you !
segments.speaker: S1
